config.name: Ack-By-Email
config.author: JoomlaXi
config.description:
Ack-By-Email action allows you to send acknowledgement to user via email.
Purpose of this action is to send an auto-reply whenever user submits a form.
You can set the email content as per your requirement.
config.help:
You can use the user submitted data in the subject and content of the email.
With reference to the example, you can use [[email]], [[subject]] for user input values.
